page: CE60114: Structural Health Monitoring And Control

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to structural health monitoring. Non destructive techniques (NDT). Mechanical Strain and Displacement gages. Static . load testing. Accelerometers and vibration measurement. Vibration based techniques. Sensors : Fiber optic sensors, piezoelectric sensors, electrical resistance based sensors. Noncontact measurement. Numerical modeling, analysis of structures and inverse analysis. Comparison of experimental data and structural parameter updating.
page: CE60114: Structural Health Monitoring And Control
